title: Somewhere Over the Rainbow
description:
Paul “Bear” Vasquez’s life was more “whoa! whoa ho ho oh my God!” than his viral Double Rainbow video could ever capture.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
